segments.text: I can't help but notice the state of that small step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed outwards, giving it a very unstable appearance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is almost entirely standing on it, stretching upwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see it wobbling gently, threatening to tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily lose his balance and tumble backward onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hitting his head is quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And what if he falls with that plate in his hand?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes and a potential injury seem very likely outcomes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes my stomach clench just watching his precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below seems unaware of how truly dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on getting a cookie, completely oblivious to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
